meanings.definition: To smile broadly or widely in a way that shows amusement or pleasure.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't help but outgrin when she saw the adorable puppy.
meanings.sent2: The children outgrin whenever they play together.
meanings.sent3: The joke was so funny that it made her outgrin uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: Her face outgrinned the sun as she basked in happiness.
meanings.sent5: His outgrinning smile lit up the room with joy.

meanings.definition: To surpass someone in a smiling or grinning competition.
meanings.sent1: In the contest, she managed to outgrin all her competitors.
meanings.sent2: He always tries to outgrin his friends in photos.
meanings.sent3: It was a close match, but she finally outgrinned her opponent.
meanings.sent4: His ability to outgrin everyone earned him the title of 'Smile Champion'.
meanings.sent5: She outgrinned them all with her infectious laughter.
